name: The Heat Waves
description:
The Heat Waves is a 2d hack and slash where the heat affects your weapons enjoy!

Tips:

The final boss can only be damaged by the sword when he is stunned to stun him repeatedly attack him while he has his shield out.

The weapons have upgrades to deal with multiple enemies at once.

Try maxing out the sword at first.

Made by Irichu & SuddenSon
